mapper.insert: insert into event(eventname, content, starttime, length, curperson, maxperson, curmoney, totalmoney) values (#{eventname}, #{content}, #{starttime}, #{length}, #{curperson}, #{maxperson}, #{curmoney}, #{totalmoney})
mapper.update: update event set eventname=#{eventname}, content=#{content}, starttime=#{starttime}, length=#{length}, curperson=#{curperson}, maxperson=#{maxperson}, curmoney=#{curmoney}, totalmoney=#{totalmoney} where eventid = #{eventid}
